comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: 'AN Australian wedding frock' is how one could describe the frock which Cecily Sandercock will wear when she is married to Jim Fearnley on April 11. Satin with a full box pleated skirt, and a long train, it has a square neckline embroidered with seed pearls . Cecily's matron of honour —Mrs. A. Hartwig — will wear sale mauve Swiss organdie ,with narrow pleating round the square neckline. The wedding ring Cecily will wear has been made from portions of her mother's weedding ring and Jim's mother's wedding ring. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article50566163

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: The original newspaper article can be found here: trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/50566163
